parameters: \N<Ryuda Soldier>So you're Segi. I've heard all about you.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>As a life-prolonging measure for your husband who is
imprisoned, you are obligated to pay gold every 5 days
during the training period.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>The amount you are required to pay this time is \C[1][1000
MO]\C[0].
\N<Ryuda Soldier>Are you prepared to make the payment this time?\$
Ready to go
Getting ready
I'm not ready
準備出来ている

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Hmm... indeed. You have worked hard. It would be wise to
continue doing so.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Of course... should you decide to stop the payments out of
self-preservation, we will simply proceed with the
enforcement methodically.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>What's this? You don't even have enough money on you to meet
the conditions.
A
準備中
用意は出来ない
\N<Segi>...

\N<Ryuda Soldier>What's wrong? Silence won't get us started. Do what you must
do.
\N<Segi>Th-that is...

\N<Ryuda Soldier>...I see. I understand everything. It seems you're not up to
the task after all.

\N<Segi>W-wait, please! Just give me a little more time, I will
definitely get the money...!

\N<Ryuda Soldier>You have already been given ample grace period. There will
be no further leniency.
\N<Segi>But, but!!

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Come now. I said you're not up to the task, but fortunately,
it seems you still have some value to us.
A
\N<Ryuda Soldier>The amount imposed on you this time is \C[1][1000 MO]\C[0].
\N<Ryuda Soldier>Are you prepared to make the payment this time?\$
Ready to go
Getting ready
I'm not ready
準備出来ている

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Hmm... Indeed. You have worked hard; it would be good for
you to continue to strive in the future.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>However... should you interrupt the payment out of self-
preservation, we will simply carry out the procedure
solemnly.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>What is this charade? You also do not have enough money to
meet the conditions.
準備中
用意は出来ない
\N<Segi>...

\N<Ryuda Soldier>What's the matter? Silence won't start anything. Do what you
must do.
\N<Segi>Th-that is...

\N<Ryuda Soldier>...I see. I understand everything. It seems you truly are
not up to the task.

\N<Segi>W-wait, please! If you could just wait a little longer, I
will definitely have the money...!

\N<Ryuda Soldier>You have already been given ample time. There will be no
further leniency.
\N<Segi>But, but...!!

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Come now. I said you were not up to the task, but
fortunately, it seems you still have some value to us.
A
\N<Ryuda Soldier>Good work, continue to strive in the future.

\N<Man>Isn't that you, Miss Segi? If you have no business here,
it's better not to go any further.

\N<Man>This place used to be a school for the town's children, but
now it has completely changed into an educational facility
for Ruda.
